original_title: 女優に「どんなフェラチオをすればいいかわかんないぃんで実演して見せてくれません♡」と言われあわてた監督に「お前、脱げ‥監督になる為の登竜門だぞ」と言いくるめられ、嫌々チ○ポをしゃぶったあげく、中出しSEXまでされても最後は泣き寝入りするしかないサディスティックヴィレッジの女AD
overview: Female ADs who take off their clothes when they say "the one who can't take off can't be a director", and who self-blow to become a director when they say "hold".  In a sense, obedient female ADs have to be used in rehearsals.  If the actress asks, "How do you want to have sex?", I'll let the female AD SEX.  Those who can get around well will make actors, soup men, and staff squid one after another ...  But if you can make a man so comfortable, you should turn to an actress ...?
tagline: So We Told Her, "Take Your Clothes Off... Because If You Want To Become A Director, This Is The Gateway To Success" And Convinced Her To Reluctantly Suck Dick, And This Is How It All Turned Out
title: This AV Actress Asked The Director, "I'm Not Sure What Kind Of Blowjob You Want Me To Give, So Could You Show Me?" And Then The Director Started To Panic
